advancement.auraddons.auto_wrath.desc: Create an Auto Wrath to automatically damage surrounding mobs
Create a Dampening Feather to prevent fall damage
advancement.auraddons.disruption_catalys: Create a Disruption Catalyst to break things down to more basic elements
advancement.auraddons.freezer.desc: Create a Freezer to freeze surrounding blocks
advancement.auraddons.potion_enhancer.de: Create a Potion Enhancer to lengthen the usefullness of your potions
advancement.auraddons.sky_bottle.desc: Create a Bottle of the Skies using the Offering to the gods
advancement.auraddons.sky_feather.desc: Create a Feather of the Skies using the Offering to the gods
advancement.auraddons.aura_transporter.d: Create an Aura Transporter to move aura around the world
advancement.auraddons.wither_proofer.des: Create a Wither Proofer to neutralize any nearby withers
advancement.auraddons.rainbow_beacon.des: Create a Rainbow Beacon to pimp out your Beacon beam
